item.title: ðŸ“Š Try to do this with Excel :)
item.description: How to deal with a 5GB file to extract simple information? CLI is here to save your day! Yes, the command line is still alive Not only the Command Line Interface (CLI) is still a thing today on the ops side but we can even see a kind of renaissance. Automation Devops and Continuous Delivery push a frequent deployment by the developers (more than daily). This is only achievable if you have a full delivery chain automation.
